name: Dimension Shifter (Boyan, Juancaos)
description:
A prototype where the player can go between a 3D and 2D environment with the click of a button.

Controls:
WASD to move around
Space to jump
Left Mouse Button to launch up
Q to switch between 3D and 2D

Credits:
Juan C. Osorio A.
Boyan Dobrev

Made for Professor Baranyai's Build a Toy class
University of Europe for Applied Sciences
